Title: SourceGrid
Description: SourceGrid is a .NET Windows Forms grid control written entirely in C# with managed code. SourceGrid can be used to visualize or to change data in a table format.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

SourceGrid is a .NET Windows Forms grid control written entirely in C# with managed code. SourceGrid can be used to visualize or to change data in a table format.

SourceGrid News

Read all SourceGrid news here

SourceCode

SourceGrid code repository moved from CodePlex to bitbucket. Now you can find newest SourceGrid code here:
http://bitbucket.org/dariusdamalakas/sourcegrid/

Who uses SourceGrid

Read the list of companies and projects who use SourceGrid: SourceGrid users

Documentation

  • SourceGrid Documentation
  • Article at code project
  • API documentation - downloadable .chm version
  • You can view documentation in the source. See Documents folder

Features

  • three sub-components, Grid, DataGrid, ArrayGrid
  • Multi selection mode, Row Selection, Column selection, Free selection
  • Cell and Row spanning
  • MVC support
  • Full feature list

Support

  • Community support*
One of the best method if you have problems, questions or suggestions is to use the community site at http://sourcegrid.codeplex.com/Thread/List.aspx
